summary: Workflow with awaitWithTimeout and signal handlers exhibits timing issues where timeout completion doesn't trigger properly when signals are sent, causing workflows to remain stuck until the opposite condition occurs.
userImpact: Workflows using awaitWithTimeout with signals become unresponsive and require manual intervention or waiting for timeouts, preventing proper workflow execution flow.
rootCause: Race condition between timeout expiration and signal handler updates affecting workflow state evaluation
resolutionDetails: Bug was resolved through fixes to the workflow coordination and signal handling mechanism
keyQuote: Run the workflow, after 30 seconds it still stays running. If after that I send cancel signal, workflow completes with result `OK`.
